scripts.copy_fonts: shx mkdir -p static/fonts/files && shx cp node_modules/typeface-merriweather/files/* static/fonts/files && shx cp node_modules/typeface-merriweather-sans/files/* static/fonts/files && shx cat node_modules/typeface-merriweather/index.css >> static/fonts/fonts.css && shx cat node_modules/typeface-merriweather-sans/index.css >> static/fonts/fonts.css
scripts.copy_scripts: shx mkdir -p static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.slim.min.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/popper.js/dist/umd/popper.min.js static/scripts && shx cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js static/scripts
